articles.title: Germany pauses AstraZeneca COVID shots as a 'precaution' - Reuters
articles.description: Germany has suspended use of AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine, Health Minister Jens Spahn said on Monday, making it the latest of several European countries to hit pause following reports of blood coagulation disorders in recipients.
